channel.title: KCRW's Left, Right & Center
channel.itunes:author: R.Scheer, A.Huffington, M.Miller & T.Blankley
channel.description: Support KCRW's public radio podcasts. Join online at KCRW.com or call 800-600-5279. Provocative, up-to-the-minute, alive and witty, KCRW's weekly confrontation over politics, policy and popular culture proves those with impeccable credentials needn't lack personality. Featuring four of the most insightful news analysts anywhere, this weekly "love-hate relationship of the air" reaches about 50,000 of the most influential radio listeners in Southern California.
channel.itunes:subtitle: KCRW's weekly confrontation over politics, policy and popular culture.
channel.itunes:summary: Provocative, up-to-the-minute, alive and witty, KCRW's weekly confrontation over politics, policy and popular culture proves those with impeccable credentials needn't lack personality.
